means: 自足的，极为自负的，傲慢的

sentence.Network_en: Although she had various boyfriends, Madeleine was, and remains, fiercely self-sufficient.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管有过各种各样的男朋友，马德琳过去和现在一直都非常自立。

sentence.Network_en: Using traditional methods poor farmers can be virtually self-sufficient.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用传统的方法，贫穷的农民基本上能自给自足。

sentence.Network_en: He'd created a tiny, self-sufficient world for himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为自己创造了一个自我满足的小小世界。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 百度词典搜索_自 ... 自己人[ people on ones own side;one of us] 自给[ self-sufficient;selfsupporting] 自家[ oneself].
自足(Self- sufficient) Ⅰ.是耶和华的名字所启示的特性，神不受任何关系的限制(徒17:25)。
国际贸易常用英语词汇.doc_百度文库 ... 自助的 self-service 自给自足的 self-sufficient 自学的 self-taught.
如何用英语描述自己的性格？ ... original 具独创性的 self-sufficient 自立的 even-tempered 心情平稳的.

list.abs: 自足经济 self-sufficient economy 自作自受 stew in one's own juices 资产管理公司 assets management company 自谋职业 find jobs on one's own 自治区.
是理性最高的活动，使人成为神self sufficient 人不是独自生活，群居是人的天性。按他对人的理解：幸福是值得我们选取的，是自足的，人是政治的动物、理性动物→透过讨论、接触发展理性→友.
where each household is economically self - sufficient , the privately owned means of production exclusively serve the proprietor .后者每个家庭在经济上自我满足,生产手段的私人拥有独占性的服务于所有者.
Trying to be self - sufficient blind us to what God wants to do in our lives ., 汲汲追求自给自足的人 , 会令我们看不见神在我们生命中的旨意.

entry.tran: (国家或团体)自给自足的,自立的
entry.def: If a country or group is self-sufficient, it is able to produce or make everything that it needs.

example.ex: This enabled the country to become self-sufficient in sugar...
example.tran: 这使得该国的食糖能自给自足。

example.ex: Using traditional methods poor farmers can be virtually self-sufficient.
example.tran: 采用传统的方法，贫穷的农民基本上能自给自足。

entry.def: Someone who is self-sufficient is able to live happily without anyone else.

example.ex: Although she had various boyfriends, Madeleine was, and remains, fiercely self-sufficient...
example.tran: 尽管有过各种各样的男朋友，马德琳过去和现在一直都非常自立。

example.ex: He'd created a tiny, self-sufficient world for himself.
example.tran: 他为自己创造了一个自我满足的小小世界。

means.word_mean: 1. able to provide for your own needs without help from others;

sentences.cn: 这些人的粮食现在已经差不多能自给了。
